document.full_text: iran and iraq have signed an extradition agreement, the latest step in warming relations between the former warring neighbors, but baghdad denied it would be used to repatriate exiled militants to iran.
document.title: iran, iraq sign extradition accord
lines_and_colors: iran and iraq have signed an extradition agreement, the latest step in warming relations between the former warring neighbors, but baghdad denied it would be used to repatriate exiled militants to iran.
